conclusion: Liquid will flow out from A, B, C, and D and pass through baffles before reaching containers E or F.
Stream A flows straight down and hits the blue baffle.
Stream B flows straight down and hits the cyan baffle.
Stream C flows straight down and hits the red baffle.
Stream D flows straight down and hits the orange baffle.

premise: Stream A flows straight down and hits the blue baffle.
conclusion: Stream A flows to the left after hitting the blue baffle and moves toward container E.

premise: Stream B flows straight down and hits the cyan baffle.
conclusion: Stream B flows to the left after hitting the cyan baffle, then hits the black baffle, which redirects it further left toward container E.

premise: Stream C flows straight down and hits the red baffle.
conclusion: Stream C flows to the right after hitting the red baffle, then hits the purple baffle, which redirects it further right toward container F.

premise: Stream D flows straight down and hits the orange baffle.
conclusion: Stream D flows to the right after hitting the orange baffle and moves directly toward container F.

premise: Streams A and B are redirected toward container E; streams C and D are redirected toward container F.
conclusion: Container E will collect liquid from streams A and B; container F will collect liquid from streams C and D.
